title: Ad Cloud Top Level Entity DataTypes
description: Adobe AdCloud Top Level Entity DataTypes

xdm:Id.title: ID
xdm:Id.description: Unique identifier which represents primary key for the entity object.

xdm:externalId.title: External Entity ID
xdm:externalId.description: Unique External identifier as represented by the network for the entity object.

xdm:network.title: Network
xdm:network.description: Network Name as defined by the search partners.

xdm:accountId.title: Account ID
xdm:accountId.description: Account Identifier which represents account for the entity object.

xdm:externalStatus.title: Network Status Code
xdm:externalStatus.description: Network Status Code of the entity.
